GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v5.10.36
GSD.description:
sfc: farch: fix TX queue lookup in TX event handling

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.36 by commit bf2b941d0a6f2d3b9f5fa3c4c21bdd54f71ce253, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit 12804793b17c0e19115a90d98f2f3df0cb79e233. For more details please see the references link.
